ChunkText: if you need any emergency assistance upon your arrival at umbc, please contact the umbc police at 410-455-5555. tips for smooth travel you can take steps to make sure your entry to the US is as smooth an experience as possible.
ContextBefore: you do not have to take any action while entering the US concerning this form, your I-94 record indicates the kind of status you have in the us, and how long you can remain in the us.
ContextAfter: if flying, do not pack your immigration documents in your checked luggage make sure to carry them in your carry-on luggage. plan your flights appropriately if you will need a connecting flight after you first land in the us, remember that you will need to go through customs first, which can often take 1-2 hours if the process is smooth.
